field_edited_text.value:
32 SUSQUEHANNA RIVER BRIDGE

The plaza also includes a building for the administration of the mainte-
nance and operation of the bridge. This building is located off the toll plaza
in such location that the superintendent can continually oversee the toll
taking operations. The toll booths are designed to have complete glass
sections between the limits required for visability from one side to the other
side of the plaza. The estimates of cost for the administration building,
toll booths, toll taking equipment, and furnishings are based on the use of
the most recently developed and up-to-date toll taking recording devices,
designed for the speedy and efficient handling of traffic and the safe collec-
tion and recording of all tolls paid by the traveling public. The toll
plaza layout is shown on Plate 10, “General Plan and Elevation.”

GENERAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSE FOR MAINTAINING AND OPERA-
TING THE BRIDGES
